Constructor Detail

JavadocUtil

public JavadocUtil()
Method Detail

getSourceFile

public static java.io.File getSourceFile(com.sun.javadoc.Doc doc)
Returns the source File for the given Doc; this is either the .java filename for classes/methods/fields/etc, the package.html for packages, or the overview HTML file for RootDoc. Might return null if there is no source file for the given Doc.

Parameters:
doc - The doc for which to look up the filename.

formatSeeTag

public static java.lang.String formatSeeTag(com.sun.javadoc.SeeTag tag)
Parameters:
tag -
Returns:

getComment

public static java.lang.String getComment(com.sun.javadoc.Doc doc)
This utility method returns the comment text for a given method doc. If the method comment uses the "inheritDoc"-tag, it is resolved recursively.

Parameters:
doc - The method doc.
Returns:
The final comment text.

getComment

public static java.lang.String getComment(com.sun.javadoc.Tag[] tags)
Returns the HTML string for an array of Tags. Meant to be called with the result of the inlineTags() method of Doc and/or Tag, as this does not support the tag types found elsewhere. Specifically, this method handles docRoot, inheritDoc, link, and linkplain tags, as well as raw-text Tags.

getComment

public static java.lang.String getComment(com.sun.javadoc.Tag tag)
Returns the HTML string for a single tag.

Parameters:
tag -
Returns:

buildPackageList

public static void buildPackageList(com.sun.javadoc.RootDoc root)
Builds the internal list of packages used later to decide if a given class is an "external" class or if it belongs to one of these packages.

Parameters:
root - The javadoc root

getQualifiedNameIfNecessary

public static java.lang.String getQualifiedNameIfNecessary(com.sun.javadoc.ClassDoc classDoc)
Utility method which returns the name of a class or interface. For classes and interfaces of external packages, the fully qualified name is returned; for such of of the same package, only the short name is returned.

Parameters:
classDoc - The class or interface whose name should be returned.
Returns:
The short or fully qualifed name of the class or interface.

getFirstSentence

public static java.lang.String getFirstSentence(com.sun.javadoc.Doc text)
Utility method which returns only the first sentence of a given text String. This is used for the summary tables where only the first sentence of the doc of a constructor, field or method is printed.

Parameters:
text - The whole doc text.
Returns:
The first sentence of the text.

getQualifiedNameIfNecessary

public static java.lang.String getQualifiedNameIfNecessary(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
Utility method which returns the name of a class or interface. For classes and interfaces of external packages, the fully qualified name is returned; for such of of the same package, only the short name is returned.

Parameters:
qualifiedName - The qualified name of the class or interface.
Returns:
The short or fully qualifed name of the class or interface.

getClassModifiers

public static java.lang.String getClassModifiers(com.sun.javadoc.ClassDoc classDoc)
Returns a text String with the modifiers of a given class.

Parameters:
classDoc - The ClassDoc for the given class.
Returns:
A text String with all modifiers.

Parameters:
all - destination table
pos - from where must be included source table into destination table
